resources.string: AVSPlayer is your go-to app for playing local video and audio files on your Android device in both forground and background modes.

It was designed to be as simple as possible: you just tap on the app\'s icon, select one or several files in build-in file browser, and enjoy it. You can use other apps, or turn off the screen - the player will keep working in the background.
For your convenience there is a floating button with several controls to open the playlist, close the player, or select other media. That\'s all.
For more information, you can find the link to the code repository in the app description on Play Market.
* This screen is designed to be shown only once to help you get acquainted with the app.
